value.title: Maintain Bar Thickness(Width) in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to one more Short Video of Power BI. In this video, I'm going to explain how you can maintain the thickness of your bar in  Power BI. Most of the time when we add bar chart, column chart, stacked chart in Power BI, the thickness of each bar managed automatically. Sometimes, we need to maintain

value.title: DAX! Uggg - Where do you start? | Power BI

Adam has some resources to get you started in your journey.  Beginning the journey:  MS Learn: User DAX in Power BI Desktop (Free) https://docs.microsoft.com/learn/paths/dax-power-bi/

value.title: Deploy Power BI dataset schema changes WITHOUT refreshing!
value.excerpt: Think you need to always refresh your Power BI dataset even why just adding a measure? ALM Toolkit: http://alm-toolkit.com/  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration
value.excerpt: In this 2 minute Tuesday, Patrick looks at how to use Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration. Using this approach, you can easily keep Power BI updated when team members update an Excel spreadsheet hosted on OneDrive. This is a great alternative to using Google Sheets which can be painful

value.title: Expand lists in Power BI (also a look at M Syntax)
value.excerpt: I show how you can take a table that lists "Record" and expand that within Power BI. This also works with Power Query. I have a look at the M Syntax and show a cleaner approach. value.title: Power BI Tutorial: 4 Ways To Get Data
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Adam looks at 4 ways to get data in Power BI. This focuses on Power BI Desktop and the main storage modes - Import, DirectQuery and Live Connections to Analysis Services. If you are new to Power BI, be sure to check out this Power BI Tutorial: 4 ways to get data.   Import (Excel)

value.title: Power BI Walkthrough: Analysis Services Live Connect
value.excerpt: Adam walks through how to setup a live connection to Analysis Services, or Azure Analysis Services, in Power BI Desktop. This also involves getting things working with the On-Premises Data Gateway.  What is a gateway - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WJ5Y4FjkWZw Authentication with AS Live Connections
